duration_in_months: I will format the data provided, breaking it down into sections and providing explanations for each part.
full_summary:
### Riding Lawn Mower Procurement

* **Procurement ID**: cb-7296-29356406
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: 01R11-24-C029

#### Procurement Details

* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-03 13:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-08-03
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-08-10
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Open Competitive Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Nationwide (specified: Manitoba)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba

#### Solicitation

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada seeks to procure one (1) Riding Lawn Mower. This solicitation is open only to suppliers with a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT E60HS-18MOWR/B.

Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified under this RFSA should refer to the following link: Riding Mowers - Tender Notice | CanadaBuys.

#### Tender Documents

For more details, please consult the tender notice document in English [PDF]: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7296/npp---english.pdf>. The French version of the document is also available [PDF]: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7296/npp---french_0.pdf>.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this procurement, please contact:

* Zack Flamont
* Email: [zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca](mailto:zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca)
* Phone: (639) 560-3462

#### Debriefing

After the contract award, unsuccessful bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should submit a written request to the Contract Authority within 15 working days of receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The debriefing may be provided in written, verbal, or in-person format.  To request a debriefing, please follow this [link](mailto :
